title: Meanwhile in the League of Draven... [Weekly roundup - Apr 1]

replies.body: Ok, at first it was cute, but this has gone way too far.  This really seems lackluster for a featured game mode when all you did was put Draven's head on the champs and minions.  We had other minions in the pool party event, it doesn't make it a new game mode.  Honestly, I'm kinda disappointed.

urf plz

Alright, this WOULD be funny if you gave us URF mode WITH your April fools jokes. At this moment, everyone would be having fun on the Rift with crazy cooldowns and funny team fights. Even if you give it to us tomorrow, I hope you give us an extra day of URF to make up for this one. I don't know what you guys were thinking to make this the April fools day joke. Its not April fools day without URF. Its literally the only reason I even log into league anymore. To play URF, because the regular mode just got too boring. Praying to login tomorrow and seeing my beloved manatee and bomb ass music. SO disappointed when I logged in today. Logged right back off lol
Agreed. Although I do still enjoy normal games, I was disappointed when there wasn't any URF. Draven thing is ok, but URF was what I was expecting and now I'm sad it's not there...
Am I the only person who really doesn't like Draven that much even? :^)
BOOOOO GET OFF THE STAGE
Cringy as hell
#NevURForget {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

My body is saying, "tonight at 12AM URF will come and save us from this hell" but my mind is telling me Riot is actually serious about this and thought it was.. funny?  Who fucking knows at this point, I'm extremely upset that this was the route Riot took but it's their company and they do the shot calling.
This is what I waited a year for?

What happened to the fun we've come to expect on April fools from you guys every year?

It looks like the team responsible just rushed in a Draven-head resource, patched it up, and found some old contingency footage, then called it a day.

This comes across as a shaky attempt at cramming in some results to try to convince management you've been doing "stuff".

Riot has over a 1000 employees, so why does this happen?

Riot you need to listen to everybody... Don't you guys understand that most of us are not happy about this event at all. I know for sure im not happy and everybody wants URF. Yes we know what you said about how you we're not gonna release URF on April 1st 2016. But you should release it over the weekend that way everybody can enjoy it and stay up and play it. Please RIOT don't be selfish and just give everybody what they want........ URF!

What a very underwhelming April Fools this year, honestly.
Just wow riot.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Riot you have actually legit ruined my friday.
Riot doesnt listen to us anymore
Rotten fruit! Get your rotten fruit here!

We can have URF and Draven.  Can we have URF?

..I have to stop telling my friends, "play league, they have this joke URF mode on april fools"
now it's "I lied, Riot is unfun"   #they go play other games cuz they never were leaguers anyway
I'm so bummed.

literally 99% percent of the community (at least) is complaining about there not being URF, and that this 'event' sucks.
And riot still thinks "oh let's not bring surf back because.... reasons" literally everyone loves URF but still they give us this lazy excuse of an april fools. I think I speak for almost everyone if I say, we want URF, why not give it to us, why not for once please the community by just rehashing a simple game mode that probably won't even take 30 minutes to bring live.{{item:3070}}

If you haven't noticed by now Rito..... the vast majority of the community is already over this 'joke' and find it tiring less than a day into the event. I have to assume that you'll release URF for at least the weekend, because if not, you truly have fallen out of touch with your community.

And having an April fool's day 'event' that utilizes a character joke that got old 2 weeks after his release, especially when plenty of people don't even like 'DRAAAAAAAAAAAAVVVENNNN' in the slightest, is extremely lackadaisical.

I've been playing LoL for over 5 years, and this is BY FAR the weakest April Fools Event in that time.

Not to mention, the entire event is simply made to make you spend money. You can't get anything other than a summoner icon from this 'event.'

You basically put Draven heads and the word Draven all over everything, and then said "Ok we gave you Draven, now pay us if you want any more 'fun' during the event."
It stops being a joke when you piss off everyone. People who do that tend not to have friends{{champion:32}}

Instead of getting urf we got a "game mode" where Champions and minions have Draven's head that does absolutely nothing and instead is a bother when trying to play. I honestly don't understand why Riot did this or what they were thinking its already getting annoying and I'm starting to dislike Draven more by the minute.

100% agree. Rito making huge mistake with not releasing URF. I know it will come twice this year, but that's just for 4 DAYS! instead of the usual 2 weeks.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} Why Rito? why?

This is noting "special" just TWO VISUAL UPDATES ONE OF WHICH IS VERY SHIT SO FUCKING SHIT. Riot If you think anyone likes this more than URF you are either 1. Being black mailed by Darius Or 2 more high than usual. This looks like a very bad way to cash in. "Hey guys we have a new event! Buy the new bundles and skins! oh and also you have 2 bad visual updates BUT BUY MORE RP!" Like wtf ALL I ASK IS FOR ONCE IN A YEAR ONCE IN 356 DAYS FOR URF. Also me and 3 of me friends who used to play league stopped since this shit update, URF was one of the only things that still had me playing this game. Thank you Riot, Thank you for ruining my week,weekend and day. Do less crack next year.
